result.arabic_text: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
result.translation: Rabbiin warra qajeelaniif qajeeluma dabala, Hojiiwwan gaggaarii haftuu taateetu Rabbii kee biratti mindaadhaan caalaadha; deebiidhaanis isatu (irra) caalaadha.
